snippet: State lawmakers in New York managed to approve the budget before deadline, but it leaves many needs unmet.
abstract: Editorial identifies several shortcomings in $141 billion New York State budget for 2013-14; contends that lawmakers have longer list than usual of things they must do in coming year.
lead_paragraph: State lawmakers in New York managed to approve the budget before deadline, but it leaves many needs unmet.

headline.seo: A Big New York State Budget With Lots of Holes
headline.main: A Big Budget With Lots of Holes
headline.print_headline: A Big Budget With Lots of Holes
